data.title: affordable luxury hotels
data.meta_description: citizenM hotels offer affordable luxury in exciting cities in the world: London, Paris, New York, Copenhagen and many more. Free wifi and XL beds as standard.
data.text:
We know - you can't get enough of us. You'll be delighted to see where we're going next.

Water babies, assemble! Our new Miami hotel is almost here and it’s shaping up to be hotter than a metal sun lounger on Muscle Beach. Get up to 30% off for a limited time only. Book now to stay from August 12!

Get up to 30% off stays of two nights or more at our brand-new citizenM Boston Back Bay hotel. Everyone gets 20% off but if you want to save even more – a juicy 30% – become a mycitizenM+ member. Remember to book through the app to get a free drink with your next stay – celebratory cocktail (beer, coffee or soft drink) on us! Book now.

Coming to London for work, fun, or a bit of both? Stay at one of our four hotels in central London. Each one puts you right in the heart of the action. Enjoy stylish rooms, friendly ambassadors, and top locations with citizenM. See you in London!

We know - you can't get enough of us. You'll be delighted to see where we're going next.
